results.title: Because of You Quote SmartScreen Stencil - Reusable, Self adhesive - Canvas, Cards, Glass, Ceramic, Walls, Fabric, Wood, Plastic, Metal
results.description:
Our smart silkscreen stencils are very versatile, self-adhesive, yet easily adjustable AND reusable. Perfect for adding that home-made touch effortlessly. No previous experience required.

This stencil is available in three sizes: A4, A5, and A6 - the image on the stencil is smaller.
Image sizes are as followed: 
A4 stencil = 26.4 cm by 17.9 cm image | 10.39" by 7.05" image.
A5 stencil = 16.5 cm by 11.2 cm image | 6.50" by 4.41" image. 
A6 stencil = 11.2 cm by 7.6 cm image | 4.41" by 2.99" image.
All images, except for the first one, are placed on an A4 size background to give you a reference for size. The first image, which is of the large stencil, is 12" by 10" or 304.8 by 254 mm, which is slightly larger than an A4 sheet.
Note: the red and grey text in the images is added to protect copyright and is NOT part of the actual stencil.

NEED A PERSONALIZED STENCIL?

Besides stencils like these, we also make custom stencils. Go to our "Order Custom Stencil" category and click. 
Order your preferred size stencil and send us your design and preferred measurements in a private message through Etsy. 
Not sure which about the size or detail? Just contact us before you order and we will answer any questions you might have.

HOW TO USE YOUR NEW STENCIL:

1. First things first: we HIGHLY recommend turning your stencil over and writing something on the back of the foil the stencil is stuck on with a permanent marker. It doesn't matter what it says, but we write the word "NO" on it. This is to remind you NOT to stick the stencil back onto this side after use. If you do accidentally stick it back onto the wrong side of the clear foil your stencil will get stuck to it. I've done this a few times by accident, try soaking your stuck stencil and carefully peeling it off the foil, trying not to stretch it.
2. Now that you've written on the back of the foil, peel the stencil off it and stick it to a surface of your choice, be it ceramics, fabric, wood, glass, canvas, etc; flat or curved. Apply some pressure to make it stick and avoid getting air bubbles. 
3. Now apply a thin layer of water-based paint evenly over the top with a squeegee or old credit card. A brush can be used, but using strokes only, no dabbing, as bristles may damage small details on the stencil. 
4. Take off the stencil and your print is done! 
5. Make sure to rinse the stencil carefully straight after use to remove any leftover paint before this dries. We do this under running water, you can gently rub the front of your stencil to remove any paint, but do not rub the backside, simple running water should do the trick. Don't use any scrubbing tools or paint remover items as this may ruin your stencil. 
6. Shake off any excess water and place the stencil upside down on a flat surface (like your kitchen counter). Stick it the foil back on with the writing facing you. Apply some pressure and remove any air bubbles. Dab off any excess water, flip it over and let it dry. Store it out of sunlight and reuse! 
Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

results.title: Live Laugh Love Decal - Wall Vinyl Sticker Family Kids Room Mural Decor Motivation Love Home Family Fun Lettering Dance Entryway Kitchen
results.description:
Live Laugh Love Wall Decal


High quality, easy to apply, wall decal ready to be applied to any smooth, flat surface.

Multiple colors are available, please leave your selection in the notes to seller during checkout. The color options are shown in the color chart image. If a color is not chosen, the color shown will be sent.


We can do custom designs or custom sizes, just contact us, we are happy to work with you!

Great for home decoration. Easy to apply and remove. If you are planning on applying the decal to a vehicle or other outdoor surface, let us know because we have a different material that may better suit your needs.


We can make this decal larger or smaller to fit your project. Please contact me for a quote on larger sizes.

Satisfaction guaranteed.

Product Details:
• High quality matte vinyl for that painted-on look
• Easy to apply and removable (but not reusable)
• Premium commercial grade vinyl that is waterproof and UV protected
• Decal will last for years without peeling or fading
• Use indoors or outdoors
• Made in the USA
• The decals are cut out, so they have no background. The background is whatever you place the decal on.


Installation:
You will be provided with an instruction sheet with your order. Whether this is your very first time using a vinyl decal or you are a seasoned pro, please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any installation questions.

*** APPLICATION TOOL ***
If you would like a professional vinyl application tool, they are available here with no additional shipping cost:
https://www.etsy.com/listing/227960720/squeegee-vinyl-decal-application-tool


Made To Order:
Every decal is made to order once purchased. This means that we will cut your design in the color you have chosen only after your order has been placed.
It can take anywhere from 1 to 3 business days for your order to be cut and shipped out, but most orders are shipped the next day.

results.title: Dance Love Sing Live Vinyl Wall Decal - Art Quotes - Decal Sticker - Great Entryway Decor idea #dlsl
results.description:
Dance Love Sing Live vinyl wall decal is a great addition to the entryway of a home as seen here in the main photo. This high quality vinyl decal measures about 23 inches tall and 23 inches wide. 


**WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN YOUR ORDER**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
-Your chosen decal (purchased)
-Detailed application instructions
-A free test decal to practice with
-Free application squeegee for easy application 


**ADDITIONAL INFORMATION**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The vinyl decals are computer die cut, removing the background leaving just the vinyl quote for installation. Decals are made with top of the line name brand Oracal 631 or 651. Decals are removable, but they are not reusable. Think of it like a band-aid; once you take it off it is not sticky enough to reuse. 


**DISCLAIMER **
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Your decal should be applied to a clean, dry surface. Vinyl decals will not stick well to wall surfaces painted with Teflon, stain guard or low VOC paints. Order with caution if your walls are painted with these paints! If you are unsure about how the decal will stick to your wall/surface, please message us about purchasing a test decal or sample pack before placing your order. 

Because all of our decals are custom made with your choice of color, size and personalization, we cannot accept returns.

Images and colors are for display purposes only and may not accurately reflect the actual size and/or color of the item.

results.title: Primitive Decor, Live Laugh Love, Stars, Berries, Country Primitive, Art Print, Wall Hanging, Handmade, 8X8, Custom Wood Frame, Made in USA
results.description:
" Live Laugh Love " in a primitive design that measures only 8 X 8 in the handmade wood frame and will fit nicely where space is limited or fill in a small area to complete a decor.  This print has been adhered to a hard backboard and has a protective coating applied before being attached to a handmade wood frame that has been painted black. It has a hanger attached on the back for easy wall hanging or it could sit on a mantle piece or shelf. Made in the USA.

 All of the country and primitive prints that we finish are published work from various country artists such as Billy Jacobs, John Rossini, Ed Wargo, Lori Dieter, Robin-Lee Vieira, Tanya Crawford, Mary Ann June, Linda Spivey, Kim Norlien, Jim Hansel and others. The prints are adhered to a hard backboard and then a protective coating is applied to insure a long carefree life that adds a unique appearance which resembles a canvas original.

The handmade frames are cut from custom millwork which is of the highest quality material. The finished work can be displayed in any décor and enhances every type of style from formal and fancy to country and farmhouse. Because of the nature of real wood frames, each one is unique and a one-of-a-kind handmade piece. All are similar in appearance and match in size and style that compliment each other in paired or group settings. The black painted satin finish can also be custom ordered with a sanded primitive edge or also in other rustic colors. Custom orders are welcome, please message with requests.

The satisfaction and happiness of the customer are the two most important parts that go into each and every piece from Boggy Creek Primitives. I inspect every single piece before it is sent and if for any reason it is not 100% as you intended , then please contact me and I will make sure and do everything that I can so that you will be completely happy with your purchase.
